subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The chief of world cycling’s governing body is questioning why the United States Anti-Doping Agency has not sent him the file of evidence that prompted it to erase Lance Armstrong’s seven Tour de France titles and ban him for life.
snippet: The chief of world cycling’s governing body is questioning why the United States Anti-Doping Agency has not sent him the file of evidence that prompted it to erase Lance Armstrong’s seven Tour de France titles and ban him for life.
